reviewText:
The critical reviews of this movie @ Amazon were flagrant exaggerations of its quality.
This is NOT the first time this has happened to me with Amazon.
One must seriously doubt the reliablity of the criticism & evaluations
which Amazon chooses to post -- clearly geared to encourage sales;
but untrustworthy -- if not deceptive -- with regard to the movie's actual quality.
Let The Buyer Beware.
